item.title: Activity Nag
item.description: I'm trying out a month of Digital Minimalism and I wanted some… encouragement to ensure I stick to my rules. One of which is to use my laptop only for specific tasks I know ahead of time, for an hour a day only. I currently already use Activitywatch to track …
item.dc:creator: Shane Dowling

item.title: TIL Updating ZSH
item.description: To update Oh-My-ZSH, all I need to run is `omz update`. Didn't even realise there was an omz command!
item.dc:creator: Shane Dowling
